record.title: AUTHORIZING THE USE OF THE CAPITOL GROUNDS

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to the immediate consideration of H. Con. Res. 124, just received from the House and at the desk.

record.chair: The clerk will report the concurrent resolution by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the concurrent resolution be agreed to and the motion to reconsider be laid on the table, without intervening action or debate.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
